name: Gotu Kola Sambol (Pennywort Salad)
description: Fresh herb salad with gotu kola, coconut, and lime. Known for brain health.
ingredients: 2 cups gotu kola leaves, finely chopped
instructions: Wash and finely chop gotu kola
Add shallots, green chili, chili powder
cultural_notes: Must be eaten fresh. Known to improve memory. Never cooked - always raw. Must be freshly made - sambol loses flavor if stored too long. Maldive fish (umbalakada) is essential and irreplaceable. Use coconut scraped fresh, not desiccated.
